text.paragraph: Evaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca āgataṃ vinicchayasāraṃ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena dassetvā idāni tadanantarāya bhikkhunivibhaṅgapāḷiyā, tadaṭṭhakathāya ca āgatavinicchayasāraṃ dassetumārabhanto āha ‘‘bhikkhunīna’’ntiādi. Tasmiṃ apīti ettha api-saddo vuttāpekkhāyaṃ. ‘‘Samāsenā’’ti idaṃ ganthavasena saṅkhipanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Kiñcimatta’’nti idaṃ atthavasenāti veditabbaṃ.
